title: COVID19: Buttler's WC final shirt raises £65,000
description: Cricket News: England wicketkeeper Jos Buttler has raised more than £65,000 ($80,000) to help fight the coronavirus by auctioning off his World Cup final shirt.
content: World Athletics on Tuesday suspended the qualification period for the Tokyo Olympics until December 2020 in wake of the COVID-19 pandemic following consultation with its Athletes' Commission, Area Presidents and Council. "Subject to the global situation retur… [+109 chars]
